media_data.title: Creed Trilogy
media_data.director: Ryan Coogler, Steven Caple Jr., Michael B. Jordan
media_data.short_description: The movie follows the life of Adonis Creed, the son of famous boxer Apollo Creed, as he struggles with his life in and out of the ring. He finds an unlikely mentor in the form of Rocky Balboa, his fatherâ€™s old friend and rival, who helps him navigate his life and personal relationships while preparing for the boxing championship.
